channel.title: [REQUEST] CLEAN 317 PI Loading 6xx content
channel.description:
I'm in need of a cleaned 317 PI server loading 6xx content. By clean I mostly mean not multiple duplicates of commands in the Commands class, although I could fix if I wanted to.
The source also has to have [b]no[/b] artificially placed NPCs (Shops in edge, or anywhere else). Basically just a Blank 317 PI loading 6xx source with all the critical elements coded already.
Client, Server, and Cache.
Thanks. :)

item.title: [REQUEST] CLEAN 317 PI Loading 6xx content
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Oh soz, my bad.

@OP: You’re not going to find a perfect source, you’ll just have to make-do with what you’ve got.

Read full topic

item.title: [REQUEST] CLEAN 317 PI Loading 6xx content
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Lil_Smok3r, post:3, topic:545497”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=664380.msg4441327#msg4441327 date=1406734944]
Explain how hard it would be to clear the NPC spawns? Oh wait, all you have to do is go into the spawn file and delete everything.
Really. You’re asking for someone to find a server and do like 3 minutes of work to it (apart from what was done by the previous owners etc).
Why not just do it yourself? Because your definition of a clean PI is no where near mine.
When I say clean, I mean no buttons working, no dialogues, no actions, no skills, etc.
[/quote]
Dude just find the guy a clean PI, he doesn’t need your definition of clean :palm:
@OP: Clean PI[/quote]
He doesn’t want a clean PI though. He wants a PI with a bunch of content. but with no npcs and no duplicate commands.
That is, by definition, not clean.

Read full topic
